name: QS Discover for Masters and MBA in Atlanta
content: Master's and MBA candidates register at this link: https://bit.ly/3V1j1Uh Learn more about graduate school admissions, financing options, and attend career and personal branding panels. Get a step ahead of your competition and meet admissions representatives face-to-face. You'll also become eligible for exclusive scholarships and a free professional headshot, just for attending! The event is free, but spots are limited, so make sure to register now. Save your place by registering today! Time: 5:00 PM - 8:30 PM Venue details: Atlanta Marriott Marquis, 265 Peachtree Center Avenue Northeast, Atlanta, Georgia, 30303, United States Price: Free: USD 0.00
